channel.title: Quotes on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on Simba Tango

item.title: Vero Tango Quotes
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: During a class. "Good. Now that you know the move, try to enjoy it." "What?" "Enjoy it!" "Oh shit." Enjoy.

item.title: A morir
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Xanboozled _--When a man walks nicely, the woman dies in his embrace._ --_When a man walks badly, the woman wants to die._ HT: yy

item.title: Reinvention
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by pallotron "Those who don't understand [Tango] are condemned to reinvent it, poorly." – Henry Spencer (about Unix) I believe Miguel Angel Zotto to have said something along the same lines, that if you do not understand tango, how can you possibly improve it? I can’t seem to find the reference, though.

item.title: Gavito Dixit
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Gavito Dixit I ¿Bailaste el tango de tu vida esta noche? No bailes más… El tangauta #129 Gavito Dixit II El tango está entre paso y paso, allí donde se escuchan los silencios y cantan las musas. El tangauta #130 Gavito Dixit III El hombre debe saber que baila para ella,y al hacerlo, hace que ella se vea como una reina. Sólo así será el rey. El tangauta #131
